replies.author: Minecfaft69553
replies.txt_content: 应该是测试版，需要插件 。用正式版吧 。http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... 143%5D%5Btype%5D%3D

replies.author: zeroskylian
replies.txt_content: 洗衣机中间放装备，另一个地方放肥皂水桶，然后开机就能恢复装备耐久
